test_n.msg_system:
Normal Window Test
Normal Window Test

test_l.msg_system:
Larger Window Test
Larger Window Test

lexus2_cab03_010_system_01.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix

Tu objetivo en el torneo es ganar los
partidos de la liga y que Four Shine
sea el club número uno del país.

lexus2_cab03_010_system_02.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


La victoria se determina por la cantidad de ganancias
que se acumule durante una sesión. Asociate con tiendas de Sotenbori
para aumentar tu base de fans, reclutar más miembros para tu
equipo y prepararte para la última batalla de ventas

lexus2_cab03_010_system_03.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


Habla con Yuki cuando estés en el club para abrir un menú
que te permita organizar qué chicas trabajarán y realizar
otras operaciones del club

lexus2_cab03_010_system_04.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


A medida que Four Shine suba de rango, empezarán
a abrirse varios combatos y subhistorias con
el club campeón de la liga afiliada.

Al derrotar al club campeón, Four Shine podrá
desafiar a otras ligas y conseguir azafatas
de platino, así que sé proactivo a la hora de avanzar
en la historia y en las batallas de operaciones

lexus2_cab03_010_system_05.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


Haciendo crecer el club de forma constante, podrás
ganar grandes sumas de dinero de forma mas eficiente.
Trabaja duro para hacer crecer tu club y acabar con los
clubes rivales.¡Lleva a Four Shine a ser el club número uno!

lexus2_cab03_010_system_06.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


The Cabaret Club Grand Prix is made up of four leagues,
and by taking down the first place club in the league,
you can earn the right to enter other leagues.

Since Four Shine just entered the competition, they will
have to start from the Fresh League. Your first order of
business is to run through normal operations and raise
the club's profit ranking.

lexus2_cab03_010_system_07.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


In Sotenbori, there are stores that you can pay to partner up
with you. Partnered venues will introduce more customers to
the club, allowing you to increase Four Shine's fan count even
further. And since more fans means more customers, your sales will
shoot through the roof. So if you find a place that catches your eye,
strike up a deal to become their business partner.

lexus2_cab03_010_system_08.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


You can also put out recruitment ads to get more girls
for the club. By selecting "Scouting" from the menu
and paying the appropriate fee, you can try your hand
at recruiting. It is not guaranteed that a girl will
immediately join your club, however, so work that
charm and keep on recruiting!

Also, there are some girls that will only join you by clearing
certain substories. Pull out all the stops to amass the best girls
and gather the feminine force to take down rival clubs.

lexus2_cab05_040_system_01.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


You've lost in a Cabaret Club battle.

Collect and raise your hostesses,
prepare Four Shine, and try again!

lexus2_cab06_060_system_01.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


You've lost in a Cabaret Club battle.

Collect and raise your hostesses,
prepare Four Shine, and try again!

lexus2_cab07_010_system_01.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


Due to someone's accusations, Four Shine has received
a member limit penalty. With this restriction, you will
have to compete in the Executive League with a limit of up to six hostesses.

The strength of each hostess will be even more important,
so utilize dates and minigames on top of regular operations
to maximize their efficiency.

lexus2_cab07_060_system_01.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


You've lost in a Cabaret Club battle.

Collect and raise your hostesses,
prepare Four Shine, and try again!

tutorial_15.msg_system:
You can spend EXP to boost Kiryu's base stats, such as Health and
Attack, or learn Battle Skills to grant you new actions.

There are also some skills that you cannot access at the moment.
You must meet certain requirements to unlock these skills.

For the time being, try learning <color=red>Charge Attack</color>
from the Battle Skills page.

cab08_010_system_0010.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


Koyuki has gone missing.
From here on out, you will have to battle without Koyuki.

cab08_030_system_0010.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


Yua has joined the club.

cab08_040_system_0010.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


You've lost in a Cabaret Club battle.

Collect and raise your hostesses,
prepare Four Shine, and try again!

cab09_040_system_0010.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


You've lost in a Cabaret Club battle.

Collect and raise your hostesses,
prepare Four Shine, and try again!

sinnkyuuinn_info_01.msg_system:
Receiving acupuncture will allow you to
tap into your hidden potential and learn
new skills.

sinnkyuuinn_info_02.msg_system:
However, there are requirements that
must be met in order to learn these skills.
Otherwise, you cannot receive acupuncture.

lexus2_adv04_0040_system_01.msg_system:
Hurry and Carry Sayama to Aoi (1/2)

Sayama's health will decrease over time as you
dash around town. Running into people will also
decrease her health, so carry Sayama to Aoi safely
before her health is gone.

lexus2_adv07_0010_system_01.msg_system:
Head to Emoto Clinic (1/2)

Kazuki's health will decrease over time as you
dash around town. Running into people will also
decrease his health, so carry him to Emoto Clinic safely
before his health is gone.

lexus2_adv12_0010_system_01.msg_system:
Head to Aoi Before You Collapse (1/2)

Kiryu's health will decrease over time as you
dash around town. Running into people will also
decrease your health, so get to Aoi safely before
your health is gone.

reach_ivent_win.msg_system:
You've won the Sotenbori Cup!
You obtained 400,000 yen as a reward.

reach_ivent2_win.msg_system:
You've won the Replacement Match!
You obtained 1,000,000 yen as a reward.

lexus2_adv04_0040_system_02.msg_system:
Hurry and Carry Sayama to Aoi (2/2)

If you get spotted by one of the many chatty citizens
of Sotenbori, you'll have to listen to their idle talk,
which means you'll lose precious time. Watch out for them
and make haste with Sayama to safety.

lexus2_majima_atm.msg_system:
Ayuda a Kiryu con recuerdos

Si aportas recuerdos a Kiryu a través del cajero
automático de una tienda, podrás recuperar un objeto
de igual valor en los escondites cuando controles
a Kiryu en la historia principal.

Tambien puedes hacer uso de ese dinero sobrante en la
Saga Majima, así que aseguraté de enviar algunos recuerdos.

lexus2_adv07_0010_system_02.msg_system:
Head to Emoto Clinic (2/2)

If you get spotted by one of the police officers
wandering around town, they'll question you and
cost you precious time. Watch out for them and make
haste with Kazuki to safety.

lexus2_adv12_0010_system_02.msg_system:
Head to Aoi Before You Collapse (2/2)

If you get spotted by thugs along the way, they'll
pick on you and attack. Avoid them and hurry to Aoi.

series_save_data.msg_system: System data from the Yakuza series has been found.

tougi_01.msg_system:
Rules of the Coliseum

1. Whoever fights through to the end is the winner.
2. 30% of max health is recovered during match intervals.
3. Honor is given to the winner of the championship.

lexus2_adv11_0050_system_01.msg_system:
When you want to make a phone call, select
"Phone Number Memo" from your Valuables.

cab08_060_system_0010.msg_system:
Cabaret Club Grand Prix


Yuki is stocking up to prepare for the deciding match.

Come back to Four Shine after progressing through the main story a bit more.

special_costume_open.msg_system:
You received the Comedian Suit.

You can change any time at a hideout in Premium Adventure.

patch01_costume_open.msg_system:
You received the Cabaret Manager.

You can change any time at a hideout in Premium Adventure.

patch02_costume_open.msg_system:
You received the Pajamas.

You can change any time at a hideout in Premium Adventure.

patch03_costume_open.msg_system:
You received the Majima Construction Helmet.

You can change any time at a hideout in Premium Adventure.

patch04_costume_open.msg_system:
You received the Golden Suit.

You can change any time at a hideout in Premium Adventure.

lexus2_adv05_0010_system_01.msg_system: You now have access to a hideout.

illusion_info1.msg_system:
Guide Il Yu-Jin (1/2)

While taking Il Yu-Jin on a tour, you cannot do the following:

<symbol=bullet_point>Talk with the people of Kamurocho
<symbol=bullet_point>Use stores such as restaurants
<symbol=bullet_point>Move around using taxis
<symbol=bullet_point>Enter certain buildings
<symbol=bullet_point>Battle on the streets
<symbol=bullet_point>Save from the Pause Menu

illusion_info2.msg_system:
Guide Il Yu-Jin (2/2)

The tour will end if Il Yu-Jin gets caught up
3 times with his many female admirers while
strolling around town. So guide him carefully.


Also, you can stop the tour whenever you want
by talking to Il Yu-Jin. Now, take Il Yu-Jin
to his destination while avoiding his fans!

lexus2_suba17_beam.msg_system: You can now use the Weapons Dealer at Beam.
